title: How to use iterations in the data layer
body_html:
import torch.utils.data as data

class MyData(data.Dataset):
  def __init__(self, alist):
    imgs = []
    for i in alist:
      imgs = imgs + blabla      # scan folders
    
    self.imgs = imgs

it always gives me an error:
TypeError: 'Compose' object is not iterable

So how can I scan the list in my own dataset?
body:
```
import torch.utils.data as data

class MyData(data.Dataset):
  def __init__(self, alist):
    imgs = []
    for i in alist:
      imgs = imgs + blabla      # scan folders
    
    self.imgs = imgs
```

it always gives me an error:
TypeError: 'Compose' object is not iterable

So how can I scan the list in my own dataset?
